name: A Little Police Car in Action Free: 3D Driving Game for Kids with Cute Graphics
name_original: A Little Police Car in Action Free: 3D Driving Game for Kids with Cute Graphics
description:
Driving on the highway makes you free! At least some common contemporary philosophers say so. Being a driver of a powerful car is still a cool thing and a lot of people fell the freedom, feel free to adventure around with a car.
We have other people, who want to defend our freedom. Who want the common people to live by the rules. You can be good or you can be bad - the rules are rules.
That people is called Police. They are the keepers of order and laws, they are the “good guys”. We created then a simulator game to let the best police car drivers to show their skills. Those drivers can be good kids or bad kids, we really don't care - but they will be the drivers of the best Police cars, and they can roam freely around to catch guys who believe they are free from the laws and rules.
The free simulator let's you drive a sophisticated Police car, but beware - the roads are not free! They are full with good and bad guys too...
And all in all it's just a free Police car simulator game.

Features
- Unique driving experience with alternate controls. Controls are switchable.
- Special challenges, as High Traffic, Crossroads, Moving Machinery, other obstacles...
- You can level up in 5 different areas to earn extra profits and proof your driving skills
- Beautifully crafted 3D Cartoon environment
- Different police cars to drive with unique Settings for better driving experience
- Customizable gameplay with numerous upgrades
- Lots of different power-ups
